game_description: A portal to the Universe! Experience genuine love, money, & career readings in a fresh, fully-immersive virtual environment. Tarot card readings with Tarot expert ‘Aura’ have come to life for the first time in VR. 🔮FEEL TRULY CONNECTED Tarot Life enables its users to feel like they are genuinely closer to the Tarot reader. Owing to the realistic visuals; calm & soothing environment, users get a platform where they can interact with Virtual Tarot Reader with Aura and get divine guidance. 🔮READINGS YOU REALLY NEED: Get unheard but accurate conclusions about your past, present, & future. Here, you can ask any concern & Aura will help you address them with: ✔️Love Tarot Readings ✔️Money Tarot Readings ✔️Career Tarot Readings 🔮CLASSIC TAROT READING EXPERIENCE, NOW IN VR: Brought to life with a beautiful, hand-painted, Rider Waite inspired tarot deck, a collaboration of the 🎴 22 Major Arcana cards & the energy surrounding you will provide you the medium to look into your future.
review_1: But will more content be added? it's kinda buggy as well, please fix! Oh yea can you add background environments to fill the main environment?
